Channeled Magic: 2 additional S6 spell slot

Elemental Affinity: +1 HP ancestry damage type on spells
Empowered Spell: May spend 1 Sorcery Point to reroll 1 spell damage dice
Font Of Magic: May use 16 Sorcery Points/long rest/May convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Heightened Spell: May spend 3 Sorcery Points to inflict target Disadv on spell save
Mind Within The Weave: May simultaneously maintain concentration on two spells
The Channeling: May spend a level 1 slot to change the spell damage type, a level 2 slot to reroll 1 or 2 on a spell damage die, or a level 3 slot to give three spell targets Disadv on spell save
The Eye Opens: May cast True Seeing 3/long rest
